divs: Sighting DetailsI am reporting a bright blue glowing disc object. There was a red light coming out like a laser beam. I seen come out of twice. It appeared it was going slow in speed. This is my 2nd sighting in less than a week. I hope other seen this as this thing looked very close and glowed.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around March 12th 2012
Summary: Very Bright Blue Disc Object Heading toward Midway Airport
